description: Bolse Lastest 4.2A/20W High Output Dual USB Car Charger. This compact charger is perfect for the modern commuter who needs power for their iPad and smartphone while on-the-road. With a total output of 4.2A, this charger can power up to 2 Tables (Samsung and iPad) at the same time or any other USB powered device. Few other devices on the market can offer this much power. Use your existing USB charging cables to charge most USB powered devices. Sophisticated circuit desing with over-heated, over-current, over-charging protection. Charging will be automatically stop when battery is full.Specifications:Input Voltage: 10-24V DCUSB Output 1: 5V, 2.1A(Max) - Designed for Android OnlyUSB Output 2: 5V, 2.1A(Max) - Apple ProductsTotal Output: 5V, 4.2A (Max)Compatibility:iPads (all versions, upto 2.1A rapid charge)Android smartphones - HTC, All Droids, Samsung (upto 1A rapid charge)All iPhones and iPods (upto 1A rapid charge)Others Android phones / GPS / Tablet etcPackage Includes:1 Bolse 4.2Amps 20W Dual Port USB Car Charger, 1 User Guide12 Month Manufacturer Warranty from Bolse
title: [New Release] Bolse 4.2Amp 20W High Output Turbo Charge Dual USB Port Car Charger for iPad, iPhone 5, Samsung Galaxy S3 / S4, Amazon Kindle Fire, etc.
